title: Language development in multicultural classroom: science
creator_credit: Lisa Milner and Sydney College of Advanced Education
brief_description: Focuses on how to develop specific language related to science for English as a second Language students. It shows how grade 3 and 4 explored a theme around a unit on Space, providing the viewers with both strategies and practical ideas.
